extDesc.message: Se synchronise avec votre compte Basecamp et affiche vos todos
extDesc.description: Extension description shown in Chrome > Extensions.

needAuth2.message: pour synchroniser votre compte Basecamp avec l'extension.
needAuth2.description: Tell user that Bitx is now synchronized.

syncMess.message: Votre Todo extension pour Basecamp est maintenant connecté à votre compte !
syncMess.description: Tell user that Bitx is now synchronized.

startMess.message: Vous pouvez commencer à utiliser l'extension.
startMess.description: Tell user he can use Bitx.

searchTodo.description: Placeholder before typing in search box.

header_overdues.description: Title of the header related to late tasks.

header_today.description: Title of the header related to tasks due today.

header_upcoming.description: Title of the header related to future tasks.

header_noduedate.description: Title of the header related to tasks without due date.

addedDate.description: Display the date when the todo was created.

dayLate.description: Append to the counter of days late of late tasks.

daysLate.description: Append to the counter of days late of late tasks.

dayLeft.description: Append to the counter of days left to achieve future tasks.

daysLeft.description: Append to the counter of days left to achieve future tasks.

lastUpdate.message: Dernière mise à jour : il y a
lastUpdate.description: Tooltip to check when was the most recent comment.

minutesAgo.description: Tooltip to check when was the most recent comment in minutes.

hoursAgo.description: Tooltip to check when was the most recent comment in hours.

daysAgo.description: Tooltip to check when was the most recent comment in days.

countOverdues.description: Tooltip to understand the overdues counter in the header.

countToday.description: Tooltip to understand the today todos counter in the header.

countUpcoming.description: Tooltip to understand the upcoming todos counter in the header.

countNoDueDate.description: Tooltip to understand the no-due-date todos counter in the header.
